dct_title_s: Soria e Terra Sancta nova tabula
dct_alternative_sm: Soria e Terra Sancta nova tabvla
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, islands off coast, places of historical interest.
Appears in Ptolemaeus, Claudius, Geographia, Venezia, Nicolo Bascari, 1548.
